definition: a frame covered with cloth or plastic and joined to a long string, that you fly in the air when the weather is windy
the title of a male ruler of a country
the group of people who work for an organization
a small animal with fur, four legs, a tail, and claws, usually kept as a pet or for catching mice
to have information in your mind
the flat part of the body that a bird, insect, or bat uses for flying
the ability to do things that need a lot of physical or mental effort
an area in which animals, especially wild animals, are kept so that people can go and look at them or study them
